name: Project_Dopimane_ragdolls
description: ragdoll simulator, you can spawn dummies and have a lot of fun i made this project in 2 days so everything might no be as polished , no doubt i am going to update the game every now and again but the updates are going to be big instead of small, the ragdolls play animations at the same time so they feel more alive. please give feeback so i can improve the game
